title: ビットコイン古参投資家が430億円相当BTC売却、ビットマインは460億円相当ETH買い増し
contentSnippet: 1万BTC以上を保有する古参投資家が10日足らずで2,587BTCを売却した一方、ビットマインは今週3億ドル超のイーサリアムを購入し、保有額130億ドル超に拡大。

title: 米カナリー、XRP現物ETFの申請内容を更新　11月13日のローンチが可能に
contentSnippet: キャナリー・ファンズがXRP現物ETFのS-1申請を更新し、遅延修正条項を削除し11月13日の上場を目指す。CEO予測では初月約1.5兆円の資金流入見込み。

title: Advanced AI is Reviving Fears of Demon Possession
contentSnippet: Religious thinkers and technologists are debating AI’s spiritual risks as the technology becomes more ubiquitous.

title: 米投資銀行バーンスタイン、イーサリアム保有企業シャープリンクの目標株価を大幅引き上げ
contentSnippet: バーンスタインがイーサリアム保有企業シャープリンクのカバレッジを開始し、2026年末の目標株価24ドルを設定した。現在の株価から約75%の上昇余地があると評価。

title: 米資産運用企業ウィズダムツリー、Plumeで14のトークン化ファンドを展開
contentSnippet: 米ウィズダムツリーがRWAトークン化専門のPlumeネットワーク上で14のトークン化ファンドをローンチ。機関投資家向けに規制対応済みの投資商品を提供し、伝統的資産運用とDeFiの架け橋を実現。

title: バイナンスUS、トランプ関連銘柄上場を批判した米民主党議員に反論
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所バイナンスUSは、トランプ大統領の関連銘柄を上場したことを批判した米民主党議員に反論。ビジネスの通常の決定でさえも不当に政治問題にされるのは遺憾であると述べている。

title: Myriad Moves: Bitcoin Odds Flip Bearish as Traders Expect Longest US Gov Shutdown in History
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on Bitcoin's next move, the U.S. government shutdown, and more.

title: アップホールド、米国でデビットカード再開　XRP還元率最大6%
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレット企業アップホールドが米国でデビットカードサービスを再開した。ユーザーはドルや仮想通貨での支払いで最大6%のXRP報酬を獲得できる。

title: 'It's a Really Big Deal': Ethereum Developers Set Final Date for Fusaka Upgrade
contentSnippet: Fusaka, which will introduce a new, efficient data-sampling method for transactions called PeerDAS, will go live in early December.

title: ストラテジー3Q決算、純利益4300億円　前期比で大幅減少
contentSnippet: ストラテジーが第3四半期決算を発表し、純利益28億ドルを計上したが前期の100億ドルから大幅に減少。ビットコイン価格下落で評価プレミアムが圧縮され、mNAV倍率は1.2倍まで低下。

title: AAVE Drops 8% Amid Crypto Weakness Despite RWA DeFi Momentum
contentSnippet: The lending protocol's token showed weakness as technical support crumbled, plunging below $210.

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy Records Q3 Profits of $2.8 Billion
contentSnippet: Strategy has built a Bitcoin treasury in excess of $68 billion.

title: コインベース決算、純利益666億円に急増　仮想通貨市場のボラティリティから恩恵
contentSnippet: コインベースが第3四半期決算を発表し、純利益が4億3260万ドルと前年同期の7550万ドルから大幅に増加。仮想通貨のボラティリティ上昇で取引高が拡大したことが要因。

title: スカイ（SKY）の買い方・将来性、ステーブルコインUSDSの特徴をわかりやすく
contentSnippet: Sky Protocol（スカイ）は、S&P格付け取得で注目の次世代DeFi。SKYトークンとUSDSステーブルコインの買い方、特徴、将来性をわかりやすく紹介します。

title: Solana Tumbles 8%, Erasing All Year-Over-Year Gains as Spot ETF Debuts Fail to Boost Price
contentSnippet: One onchain observer noted a large transaction by Jump Crypto, speculating that the crypto firm might be rotating SOL into BTC, perhaps weighing on sentiment.

title: BNB vs XRP: Here’s How Traders Are Playing These Markets
contentSnippet: With less than $1 billion separating BNB and XRP in market cap, the battle for fourth in the crypto rankings is heating up. Which way will it go?

title: ETH Selloff Meets Late Bounce as Volume Climbs; Range Tightens as Risk Appetite Plunges
contentSnippet: Heavier trading met a late rebound after a breakdown, narrowing the range and putting nearby checkpoints back in focus.

title: Coinbase Beats Q3 Forecasts as Transaction Revenue Jumps to $1 Billion
contentSnippet: The company recently said that it’s exploring a token for its Ethereum layer-2 network, Base.

title: グレースケールのソラナETF、初日2億円純流入　パウエルFRB議長のタカ派姿勢が影響か
contentSnippet: グレースケールのソラナETFが29日に取引を開始し、初日に140万ドルの純流入を記録した。1日早く上場したビットワイズのBSOLは同日4650万ドルの流入を集めて先行している。

title: Coinbase Tops Expectations as Transaction Revenue Hits $1B
contentSnippet: Coinbase’s Base network became profitable in Q3 as transaction volume rose and ETH prices climbed, supporting broader gains across trading and services.

title: Strategy Posted EPS of $8.42 in Q3 Driven by Mark-to-Market Gains on Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's action of late hasn't been great, but the price did rise nearly 7% in the three months ended September 30, boosting reported profits for Michael Saylor's firm.

title: DOGE Slides 7.5% to $0.18, Triggering Technical Breakdown
contentSnippet: Despite expectations for Q4 rallies, Dogecoin's market structure remains fragile, with traders watching if it can defend the $0.18 base.

title: XRP Plunges 8% as Fed Shock and Bitcoin Weakness Combine to Break $2.46 Floor
contentSnippet: The breakdown was accompanied by outsized volume, with a peak around 392.6 million tokens — nearly 400% of its daily average.

title: Bitcoin Miner Core Scientific Investors Nix $9 Billion CoreWeave Merger
contentSnippet: Shareholders on Thursday rejected the deal, which was first announced in July.

title: Retail Bitcoin Traders Are Showing Most Fear Since Oct. 20 Crypto Crash: Santiment
contentSnippet: Volume rose 60.5% above the weekly average as long-term holders sold 325,600 BTC and trading compressed into a $107,000 to $108,000 band near support.

title: Dogecoin Is About to Be All Over This Soccer Team's Jerseys and Stadium
contentSnippet: The commercial arm of the Dogecoin Foundation is putting the famous Shiba Inu meme coin logo on soccer jerseys in Italy.

title: Chainlink's LINK Drops 8% Below Support Despite Largest Token Buyback Since August
contentSnippet: The oracle network's token succumbed to the broader crypto market weakness, even though adoption continues growing with a recent Ondo partnership.

title: Rate Cuts NOT certain! MegaETH raised over $1.25B in public ICO! Crypto Majors Fall 2-3%!
contentSnippet: Crypto Majors Are Red After Fomc’s Shaky Guidance And A Successful Trump Xi Meeting; Btc -3% At $110,100, Eth -3% At $3,900, Bnb +1% At $1,120, Sol -2% At $192. Zec (+9%) And Aero (+7%) Led Top Movers

title: Bitcoin Could Tumble Back to $88K: Glassnode
contentSnippet: The analytics firm warns that Bitcoin’s failure to reclaim the $113K cost basis may lead to a far deeper retracement amid long-term holder selling and fragile sentiment.

title: How Solana and XRP Futures Became CME’s Fastest Growing Crypto Products
contentSnippet: CME’s Solana and XRP futures hit record notional open interest on Monday.
